content: introduction each of the vvcal 2018 squares were dedicated to a tree by one of the members of my cypresstextiles tree huggers facebook group the wisteria was suggested by jacqueline de kruijf thank you materials and measurements yarn scheepjes softfun affiliate link - 60% cotton 40% acrylic 140m/50g color if using the warm neutrals palette make 5 square each of 9 colors and 6 squares each of 3 colors leaving the cream out for joining and border hook us size 4 5mm size 6 inches key stitch descriptions 2dccl 2dc cluster yoh insert hook in st/space yoh pull up lp yoh pull yarn through 2 lps 2 times yoh pull yarn through 3 lps 4trcl 4tr cluster * yoh 2 times insert hook in st yoh pull up lp yoh draw yarn through 2 lps 2 times repeat from * 3 times yoh draw yarn through 5 lps beg beginning beg 2dccl beginning 2dc cluster beg double_crochet double_crochet in st/space beg 4trcl beginning 4tr cluster beg treble_crochet * yoh 2 times insert hook in same st yoh pull up lp yoh draw yarn through 2 lps 2 times repeat from * 2 times yoh draw yarn through 4 lps beg double_crochet single_crochet ch1 - counts as 1 double_crochet beg treble_crochet single_crochet ch2 - counts as 1 treble_crochet chn chain n number of times double_crochet double_crochet lp loop magic_ring make ring slip knot ch3 slip_stitch in third chain from hook single_crochet single_crochet space space chain space slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch treble_crochet treble_crochet yoh yarn over hook
